Description: Redwood trees from a range of diameters and crown positions were subjectively sampled.

The photosynthetic tissue was divided into five morphological types and subsamples were scanned for projected leaf area using the Regent Instruments WinSeedle software. Projected leaf area was then expanded from the scanned sample to morphological type
column4: branch category level within crown section

Description: cross sectional area of stem section including only sapwood in cm2
Tree height from ground to tree top
second-growth redwood forests on coastal sites in Mediterranean environment
